data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Vrancea who will make disciples who make disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vrancea, Romania
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 20,097 believers in Vrancea, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 277,260 people in the state of Vrancea who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Vrancea. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Turk people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, help the 20,097 believers in Vrancea to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 20,097 believers find a person of peace today among the 297,403 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.section_summary:
the state of Vrancea, Romania has a population of 317,500.

We estimate Vrancea has 20,097 people who might know Jesus, 277,260 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 20,143 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Vrancea to agree with you and with one another.
